headers.subject: [tosdr:2893] Gittip: [Bad] Termination without notification or appeal

subject: Gittip: [Bad] Termination without notification or appeal
text:
Title: [Bad] Termination without notification or appeal
Topic: suspension
Summary: Gittip can shut down accounts at-will.
Score: 0

> Notwithstanding any of these Terms, Gittip reserves the right, without notice and in its sole discretion, to terminate your license to use the Site and/or to block or prevent your future access to, and use of, the Site.

Discussion:

I wish that Gittip had some kind of language in its ToS regarding what happens to an account balance when an account is closed.

Note: This is a part of the series of ratings as a part of gittip issue #1898.

https://github.com/gittip/www.gittip.com/issues/1898

References:

Gittip Terms of Service 

https://www.gittip.com/about/terms/

Gittip Privacy Policy

https://www.gittip.com/about/privacy/
